    public class MapEditorGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    In MapEditor package and this class is used for edit the map via GUI approach

    1.1
    作者:
    Team36
